title: The fable of Ouid treting of Narcissus, tra[n]slated out of Latin into Englysh mytre, with a moral there vnto, very pleasante to rede. M.D.LX.
author: T. H., fl. 1560.
publisher: By [J. Tisdale for] Thomas Hackette, and are to be sold at hys shop in Cannynge strete, ouer agaynste the thre Cranes,
notes: Signed at end: TH., i.e. Thomas Howell? Thomas Hacket?.
The moralization occupies the bulk of the book.
Running title reads: Ouids fable of Narcyssus.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
